page.title: 21horfield common, total brilliance
page.content:
horfield common, is a brilliant open space for sports, picnics, public events and displays ,it has an alright play area and many facilities including a sports center and swimming pool, and at a 90 degree turn an A.C.F (army cadet force) venue. However there is lots of litter on the field behind the sports center and many back lanes for hiding and losing any possible followers it is a good crossroads one way filton and cribbs causeway shopping and the other Gloucester road into town.
rick
